data.lyric:
[ti:Bleed (Explicit)]
[ar:A Boogie Wit Da Hoodie]
[al:Bleed (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Bleed (Explicit) - A Boogie Wit Da Hoodie
[00:00.69]Lyrics by：Artist Dubose/Joseph Zoumboulias/Shaun Thomas
[00:01.39]I don't need love that s**t is so so petty
[00:04.09]Don't you go tweet about it we could speak about it if you really
[00:06.38]Really with me
[00:07.32]Growing up bein' in the gas stations in the CVSs gettin' gifties yeah
[00:10.58]And if you really my n***a
[00:11.92]Word to mother we gon' split it fifty-fifty yeah
[00:13.93]They call me a SoundCloud boy
[00:15.46]They stealin' my sound now boy
[00:17.11]I feel like I'm really the king in my city
[00:18.95]I got the crown now boy
[00:20.66]Two .38s on the side of me lookin' like a cowboy yeah
[00:23.98]N***as be actin' like b***hes I might as well just call you tomboys
[00:27.08]Don't play with me .38 on me and I'm feelin' so so special
[00:30.72]N***as is lucky I'm busy gettin' money 'cause I really could've left you
[00:33.93]Pull up in my hoodie on the scene so so scary
[00:37.38]I probably got more Mike Amiri jeans than Mike Amiri
[00:40.81]Yeah beasty used to lurk in the bushes
[00:43.80]Now when I open my eyes I look in the sky
[00:45.89]Hopin' I make it to Heaven
[00:47.23]You can have family ties all rats gotta die
[00:48.97]You can still be a dub if you tellin'
[00:50.33]And even if it was my cousin it is a dub
[00:52.64]F**k it just knock off his melon
[00:54.44]I swear I don't need love that s**t is so so petty
[00:57.54]Don't you go tweet about it we could speak about it if you really
[01:00.06]Really with me
[01:00.89]Pull up in my hoodie on the scene so so scary
[01:04.22]Probably got more Mike Amiri jeans than Mike Amiri
[01:08.43]Heard they wanna catch me lackin' oh please
[01:11.82]Yeah they don't know I'm really odee
[01:15.69]N***as rattin' eatin' on cheese
[01:18.86]Just free the real until they all free
[01:22.38]Hoodie on rockin' long sleeves uh uh
[01:25.69]Richard Mille make my wrist bleed mmm mmm
[01:29.49]Lamborghini car keys vroom vroom
[01:32.49]I don't know why they actin' like they G'd up hmm mmm
[01:35.83]Wipe a n***a nose like he sneezin' hmm mmm
[01:39.15]Go to Elliot for Aquafina huh uh
[01:42.50]Chain lookin' like a hockey puck hmm like a freezer hmm
[01:47.21]You told me never say never
[01:48.37]Then you told me you would never get me set up
[01:50.16]Yeah
[01:50.53]But love is a set-up already
[01:51.97]Should have said "I love you" to a Bentley
[01:53.50]Mmm
[01:53.72]I know n***as that ain't even graduate can't leave the country
[01:55.81]They felons already
[01:57.05]But f**k it at least they know better
[01:58.70]Any n***a could tell ain't no tellin'
[02:00.41]I done seen n***as tell on they brother
[02:01.87]Them n***as was there for you when you were strugglin'
[02:03.63]I done seen n***as love on they b***h
[02:05.12]And go kiss her and hug her right after she suckin' d**k
[02:07.11]And you gotta watch out for n***as that's watchin' your money
[02:09.26]Watch who you get money with
[02:10.57]And don't you compete with your own gang no
[02:12.42]Don't you go be on no funny s**t
[02:13.99]'Cause n***as will tell on they whole gang 'cause they was jealous
[02:16.40]So jealous yeah
[02:17.41]I was addicted to Balmain I did every Amiri denim
[02:20.26]Yeah
[02:20.64]I'm not a regular person I threw away all my Margielas
[02:23.65]Yeah
[02:23.83]Got a closet with nothing but fly s**t
[02:25.65]Trendsetter from my hat to my sweater yeah yeah
[02:28.20]I swear I don't need love that s**t is so so petty
[02:31.49]Don't you go tweet about it we could speak about it if you really
[02:33.99]Really with me
[02:34.85]Pull up in my hoodie on the scene so so scary
[02:38.14]Probably got more Mike Amiri jeans than Mike Amiri
[02:42.91]Hoodie on rockin' long sleeves uh uh
[02:46.25]Richard Mille make my wrist bleed uh uh
[02:50.09]Lamborghini car keys vroom vroom
data.trans:
[ti:Bleed (Explicit)]
[ar:A Boogie Wit Da Hoodie]
[al:Bleed (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.69]//
[00:01.39]我不需要爱 那玩意儿太麻烦
[00:04.09]不要在网上发牢骚 我们可以好好谈谈 如果你真的
[00:06.38]真的在乎我
[00:07.32]从小就在那种环境下耳濡目染 那种东西能给我很多灵感
[00:10.58]如果你真的是我的好兄弟
[00:11.92]对我妈妈保证 我会和你分享一切
[00:13.93]他们称呼我为SoundCloud男孩
[00:15.46]现在他们都抄袭我的音乐
[00:17.11]我感觉我真是我所在城市的主宰
[00:18.95]现在我戴上了皇冠
[00:20.66]腰间别着两把手枪 看起来就像个牛仔
[00:23.98]有些男人就像娘们一样 我还是叫你们假小子吧
[00:27.08]不要跟我闹 我身上带着枪 我感觉自己好特别
[00:30.72]有些人很幸运 我忙着挣钱 因为我真的可以离开你
[00:33.93]我穿着连帽衫来到现场 吓死个人
[00:37.38]我的Mike Amiri牛仔裤可能比Mike Amiri本人还要多
[00:40.81]狂暴 以前常常躲在暗处 准备偷袭
[00:43.80]现在当我睁开双眼 看着天空
[00:45.89]希望我能去往天堂
[00:47.23]你可以有亲人 所有内鬼都得死
[00:48.97]如果你告密 你就真的是个混蛋
[00:50.33]就算是我的兄弟 依然不能饶恕
[00:52.64]什么都不管 必须让他尝点苦头
[00:54.44]我发誓 我不需要爱 那玩意儿太麻烦
[00:57.54]你不要在网上胡说八道 我们可以好好谈谈 如果你真的
[01:00.06]真的在乎我
[01:00.89]穿着我的连帽衫 来到现场 可怕至极
[01:04.22]我的Mike Amiri牛仔裤可能比Mike Amiri本人还要多
[01:08.43]听说他们想要趁我不备教训我 拜托 别妄想了
[01:11.82]他们不知道 我是真的不好惹的
[01:15.69]很多人都喜欢告密 做内奸
[01:18.86]放了那些实在的兄弟
[01:22.38]穿上长袖连帽衫
[01:25.69]理查德·米勒手表让我的手腕都要流血了
[01:29.49]兰博基尼轰隆隆的响
[01:32.49]我不知道为什么他们搞得好像自己很不得了
[01:35.83]惹急了我们就一枪崩掉他
[01:39.15]去珠宝商那里买点钻石
[01:42.50]钻石项链水灵灵的 不要太闪耀
[01:47.21]你告诉过我 永远不说放弃
[01:48.37]然后你又说 你永远不会陷害我
[01:50.16]//
[01:50.53]但是爱这种东西本身就是一种圈套
[01:51.97]就应该对着宾利车说我爱你
[01:53.50]//
[01:53.72]我知道没从学校毕业的人都无法离开这个国家
[01:55.81]他们已经是重罪犯了
[01:57.05]但是去他的吧 至少他们知道好坏
[01:58.70]任谁都知道不应该告发自己的朋友
[02:00.41]我见过很多人告发自己的兄弟
[02:01.87]那些人在你困难的时候可从来没有离开你
[02:03.63]我看到很多男人爱着她的女人
[02:05.12]在她刚和别的男人亲热之后 还亲吻她 拥抱她
[02:07.11]你得小心那些觊觎你钱包的人
[02:09.26]小心和你一起赚钱的人
[02:10.57]不要和你自己的帮派竞争
[02:12.42]一定不要做些奇怪的事情
[02:13.99]因为有些人会因为嫉妒 告发他的整个帮派
[02:16.40]如此妒忌
[02:17.41]我沉迷于Balmain服装 我买了Amiri的各种牛仔裤
[02:20.26]//
[02:20.64]我不是普通人 我把我所有的Maison Margiela服装都扔了
[02:23.65]//
[02:23.83]衣帽间里面放的全是超酷的衣服
[02:25.65]从我的帽子到我的毛衣 都走在潮流前线
[02:28.20]我发誓 我不需要爱 那玩意儿太麻烦
[02:31.49]你不要在网上胡说八道 我们可以好好谈谈 如果你真的
[02:33.99]真的在乎我
[02:34.85]穿着我的连帽衫 来到现场 可怕至极
[02:38.14]我的Mike Amiri牛仔裤可能比Mike Amiri本人还要多
[02:42.91]穿上长袖连帽衫
[02:46.25]理查德·米勒手表让我的手腕都要流血了
[02:50.09]兰博基尼轰隆隆的响
